translations: 银行档案库管理服务（Bank Archive Management Service）

sentences.sentence: The airplanes sent to the fleet are forerunners of a fleet of Global Hawks the Navy will be acquiring over a 10-year period under its BAMS program.
sentences.translation: 此次向舰队运送飞机是整个“全球鹰”采办的开始，根据BAMS项目，美国海军的“全球鹰”采办期将长达十年。

sentences.sentence: Australia has declined involvement in the System Design and Development (SDD) phase of the U.S.Navy \ 's Broad Area Maritime Surveillance (BAMS) program, which USES the Global Hawk UAV.
sentences.translation: 澳大利亚简化了美国海军的“广域海上侦察系统”(BAMS)计划中的系统设计与开发阶段(SDD)的参与程序，该计划使用“全球鹰”无人机系统。

sentences.sentence: Australia has declined involvement in the System Design and Development (SDD) phase of the U. S. Navy \ 's Broad Area Maritime Surveillance (BAMS) program, which USES the Global Hawk UAV.
sentences.translation: 澳大利亚简化了美国海军的“广域海上侦察系统”(BAMS)计划中的系统设计与开发阶段(SDD)的参与程序，该计划使用“全球鹰”无人机系统。
